adjective.description: Botany. Of germination: characterized by removal of the episperm from the sheath of the cotyledon. rare.
Chiefly Logic. Negative; specifically designating a compound proposition formed of negative statements. Now rare.

origin: Late 15th century (in an earlier sense). From post-classical Latin remotivus that removes, liable to removal from classical Latin remōt-, past participial stem of remove + -īvus.
